main event: An MP officer and airman observed an object at Holloman AFB that they concluded was probably a balloon.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 3 minutes., The object had a visible shape and was conical., It hovered and ascended to about 45 degrees in the sky., The size was described as that of a coffee cup at arm's length., The object disappeared as it got lighter, leading to the conclusion that it was likely a balloon.
